profileData.name: Shaurs S
profileData.headline: I help Business Owners Conquer Linkedin with Content | Founder and Head of Lead Generation at Outreachify.io | AI based Lead Generation | Helping Business owners Generate Leads and Reach their ICP

posts.content:
When you keep planning without action, your mind becomes your enemy.

It convinces you that the first step needs to be perfect.
To prepare for anything that could go wrong.

But constant mental activity without action is misleading.
Because action is real-time feedback!

Here’s the solution:

Don’t spend time considering whether this is the right decision.

Take the decision and then use your mental energy to improve or correct it.

The only thing that makes humans feel alive is a sense of action.
A sense of progress. 

Get out of your head.
And act!

Image via Gary Vaynerchuk 

#motivation #action #life #warikoo
posts.dateRelative: 2 weeks ago • Visible to anyone on or off LinkedIn
posts.author: Ankur Warikoo
